translation.en: [Cory] A Cory Carson Christmas.
Dear Santa Cars, all I want for Christmas this year
translation.de: Lieber Santa Saus, ich wünsche mir in diesem Jahr

translation.en: is the Honkin Henry Extreme,
batteries not included, so please send some of those, too.
translation.de: Und bitte auch ein paar Batterien.

translation.en: -It comes in an assortment of colors... -[sniffs, exhales]
translation.de: Es gibt ihn in vielen Farben, und mir würde jede gefallen.

translation.en: ...and really any color will do, but to be honest,
translation.de: Es gibt ihn in vielen Farben, und mir würde jede gefallen. Aber Orange gefällt mir am besten.

translation.en: I like orange the best. I'm not sure why.
translation.de: Aber Orange gefällt mir am besten. Ich weiß nicht genau, warum.

translation.en: Hmm. Love, Cory Carson. There.
Cory? Christmas is three days away. Those cookies are gonna get stale.
translation.de: -Fertig. -Cory? Es sind noch drei Tage. Die Plätzchen werden doch alt.

translation.en: I know! I'm just so excited about getting the Honkin Henry Extreme!
translation.de: Ich weiß. Ich freue mich doch nur so auf meinen Henry Hupe.

translation.en: I want macaroni, please!
[laughs] Well, we'll see what Santa brings. Huh?
translation.de: Mal sehen, was Santa Saus bringt.

translation.en: Whoa, did you guys hear that? Let's go check it out.
translation.de: -Hey, habt ihr das gehört? -Sehen wir mal nach.

translation.en: [Cory, Chrissy] Whoa!
[groans] What happened?
You crashed into our yard. Where were you headed?
translation.de: Sie hatten einen Unfall. Wo wollten Sie hin?

translation.en: Well, I was headed straight to... to, um, to...
translation.de: Na ja, ich wollte nach… Nach… Nach…

translation.en: Huh. I don't remember where I was headed.
Well, do you have an address we could look up?
Uh, I, I don't seem to be able to remember that either.
translation.de: Das weiß ich offenbar auch nicht mehr.

translation.en: -Oh, you've got a big dent. -Huh?
translation.de: Oh, Sie haben eine ziemliche Beule.

translation.en: You must have hit your head when you crashed.
We better get you inside for now. Good idea.
translation.de: -Kommen Sie erst mal mit rein. -Gute Idee.

translation.en: Thanks for letting me stay, but I should really be getting back to, uh,
translation.de: Herzlichen Dank, aber ich sollte jetzt wirklich nach…

translation.en: uh, somewhere. Nonsense. You stay as long as you need.
I'll find you some blankets.
Hmm. Why does he look so familiar?
translation.de: Er kommt mir irgendwie so bekannt vor.

translation.en: Oh, ho, hello there!
Oh! Oh, uh, hi!
And who might you be?
My name's Cory.
Hello, Cory, my name's, uh, it's, uh...
[chuckles] Well, I don't really remember my name.
translation.de: Ich weiß es wohl nicht mehr.

translation.en: -[Chrissy] Yum, yum, yum, yum... -Huh? ...yum, yum, yum. Cookies!
Chrissy! We're supposed to be saving those for... Santa.
[gasps] Santa Cars is in my house!
[laughs nervously] Excuse us for a second. [whispering] Come on Chrissy.
Chrissy! It's Santa Cars.
Santa? Where?
In the living room. Look.
Those kids. [laughs]
No, not Papa! The other guy.
Hey, I've got your blankets. Oh, why thank you.
Pfft, that's not Santa.
Look closer.
Hey, uh, maybe you left your wallet in your trunk.
Oh, ho. Good thinking. Ho ho ho!
Where did all these presents come from?
-[gasps] Santa! [giggles] -I can't remember. Oh, ho ho!
Macaroni, please.
OK, Chrissy. Time for bed.
Macaroni!
Psst, hey. I've got something for you.
translation.de: Hey, ich habe etwas für dich.

translation.en: Something for me?
Yeah, here you go.
Oh, thank you, Cory.
Uh, this is a very nice envelope.
Sorry I don't have something to give to you.
translation.de: Ich habe leider nichts für dich.

translation.en: [laughs] That's OK. I can wait three days.
translation.de: Schon gut. Ich kann drei Tage warten.

translation.en: What's in three days?
Come on. You don't have to pretend with me. I know.
translation.de: Komm schon, du musst mir nichts vorspielen. Ich weiß es.

translation.en: You know, three days. Till Christmas?
translation.de: Du weißt schon, noch drei Tage. Bis Weihnachten?

translation.en: Christmas? What's Christmas?
Wait, you really don't remember?
translation.de: Moment, du weißt es wirklich nicht?

translation.en: But if you don't remember that you're Santa, that means nobody's gonna get their presents.
translation.de: Aber wenn du vergessen hast, wer du bist, bekommt niemand Geschenke.

translation.en: I'm not gonna get my Honkin Henry Extreme,
translation.de: Und ich nicht meinen Henry Hupe!

translation.en: and Christmas... [gasps] Christmas is gonna be ruined! Mama, Papa!
translation.de: Und Weihnachten… …fällt ins Wasser! Mama, Papa!

translation.en: Cory, what's wrong?
He doesn't even remember what Christmas is. We need to go see Dr. Wiperglass right now!
translation.de: Er hat vergessen, was Weihnachten ist. Wir müssen zu Dr. Scheibenwischer!

translation.en: Hmm. Yup, it appears he has amnesia.
translation.de: Ja, er leidet wohl an Amnesie.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, no.
Uh, oh, no.
Could you explain what that is? Uh, you know, for the children.
translation.de: Könnten Sie erklären, was das ist? Für die Kinder?

translation.en: Amnesia is when you can't remember anything, even who you are.
translation.de: Bei einer Amnesie vergisst man alles. Sogar, wer man ist.

translation.en: Sometimes it happens when you bump your head.
What? Well, how long until he can remember?
translation.de: Und wann erinnert er sich wieder?

translation.en: Hmm, could be a while.
But Christmas is in three days!
translation.de: Aber in drei Tagen ist Weihnachten!

translation.en: Well, some cars recover faster if they're surrounded by familiar things.
translation.de: Nun, vertraute Dinge können bei der Genesung helfen.

translation.en: Hmm, so, if I show him familiar things, he might remember who he is?
translation.de: Wenn ich ihm vertraute Dinge zeige, erinnert er sich wieder?

translation.en: He just might.
OK, come on, Santa.
Is that me? Am I Santa?
translation.de: Bin ich das? Bin ich Santa?

translation.en: If you are, I could really use a new espresso machine this year. [laughs]
translation.de: Wenn ja, könnte ich eine neue Espressomaschine gebrauchen.

translation.en: Uh, OK.
I'll have you remembering in no time.
translation.de: Ich kriege das schon wieder hin.

translation.en: The most important thing about Christmas is the toys,
and this place has got tons of toys.
translation.de: Und hier gibt es jede Menge davon.

translation.en: Oh, wow. Hey, does that guy look familiar?
translation.de: Oh, wow. Kommt er dir bekannt vor?

translation.en: No, but he sure is a handsome fellow. [laughs]
translation.de: Nein, aber er sieht ziemlich gut aus.

translation.en: Why does he have that funny hat? What? That's Santa Cars. That's you!
translation.de: -Warum trägt er diese Mütze? -Was? Das ist Santa Saus. Das bist du!

translation.en: [chuckles] Really?
Come on, let's look at the toys.
Ahh, here we go. Soak it in.
translation.de: Los geht's. Lass es auf dich wirken.

translation.en: This is what Christmas is all about, toys toys toys.
translation.de: Darum geht es an Weihnachten. Spielzeug!

translation.en: Oh, look at that one. Yeah, this is a nice toy.
translation.de: Sieh dir den an! Ja, der ist toll.

translation.en: It's so happy. Do you remember Christmas now?
translation.de: Er ist so fröhlich. Erinnerst du dich wieder?

translation.en: Come on, remember.
Sorry, nothing.
Don't worry. This next thing will definitely work.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Ich weiß, was funktionieren wird.

translation.en: Behold, the Honking Henry Extreme!
translation.de: Gestatten, das Sondermodell von Henry Hupe!

translation.en: Wow, how fun is that?
It's got turbo boost and sonic sound sirens.
translation.de: Es hat einen Turboboost und echte Sirenen.

translation.en: That's pretty neat.
Yeah, I hear it can even do backflips.
[chuckles] Sounds merry and bright.
[laughs] Well, Santa, you should know.
[gasps] Santa.
You've gotten tons of letters about it, right, Santa?
translation.de: Den haben sich sicher viele gewünscht.

translation.en: -[gasps] -Santa?
Uh, sorry, Cory. I still don't remember.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, Cory. Ich erinnere mich nicht.

translation.en: Man, I really thought that would've worked. Huh?
[shopper] Huh? Santa?
Hello there, children.
[all] Santa? Santa. Santa. Santa.
[chuckles nervously] Uh...
Run!
Ah, it's perfect.
Pardon me! Ah!
Phew, that was a close one.
[chuckles] I guess I'm really popular.
[gasps] Look out, someone's coming.
Be careful with those Christmas decorations! Thank you.
[gasps] That's it. Maybe Christmas decorations will help you remember.
translation.de: Das ist es! Vielleicht hilft dir ja die Deko.

translation.en: He's right over here. Just come look.
translation.de: Er ist gleich hier. Komm mit.

translation.en: Cory, you expect me to believe that at this very moment,
translation.de: Ach, Cory. Denkst du wirklich, ich glaube, dass jetzt gerade in meinem Vorgarten…

translation.en: parked on my front lawn, is...
translation.de: Denkst du wirklich, ich glaube, dass jetzt gerade in meinem Vorgarten…

translation.en: Ho ho ho! Hi, Cory!
[gasps] Santa Cars. Oh, my gosh!
Wait, Freddie. He hit his head. He, he doesn't remember who he is.
translation.de: Warte, er hatte einen Unfall. Er weiß nicht mehr, wer er ist.

translation.en: Really? Aw, jeez, what are we gonna do?
translation.de: Wirklich? Mist. Und was machen wir jetzt?

translation.en: I'm working on it. Could you do me a favor and plug in your Christmas lights?
translation.de: Ich arbeite daran. Könntest du deine Beleuchtung anschalten?

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
Get ready.
-Wow. -[Freddie] Whoa.
[Cory] So, Santa, do you remember Christmas now?
translation.de: Und, Santa? Erinnerst du dich jetzt?

translation.en: Hmm, nope.
I still don't remember a thing.
-[chuckles nervously] -[gasps] Oh, [chuckles] hello there.
Am I on the nice list?
Ooh, great idea, Freddie. Santa, you remember the naughty or nice list, right?
translation.de: Oh, gute Idee, Freddie. Erinnerst du dich an die Liste, Santa?

translation.en: The naughty or nice list? What's that?
It's the list you keep of all the cars that are naughty or nice.
translation.de: Die Liste mit den braven und unartigen Autos.

translation.en: You know, like me and Freddie are on the nice list.
translation.de: Freddie und ich waren zum Beispiel brav.

translation.en: Hmm, so, who's on the naughty list?
Hi, Cory. What do you want?
Well?
Uh, what's going on?
She seems nice to me.
What? Oh, no, your calibration is way off, mister.
translation.de: Wie bitte? So ein Mist. Du bist ja völlig falsch eingestellt.

translation.en: Wait, uh, what's happening right now?
This is worse than I thought.
I'm gonna show you everything there is about Christmas. Let's go!
translation.de: Ich zeige dir alles über Weihnachten. Komm mit!

translation.en: [groans] Nope.
Hmm, nothing.
OK!
Mmm... Come on!
Me?
Come on!
Yeah, you got it.
No, no. No, no, no.
-No! -[laughs]
-Huh? -Yay! Santa!
Look out!
Cold! Woo, yeah!
Snow, snow, snow! [giggles]
Hey, guys, it's almost time for the tree lighting ceremony.
translation.de: Hey, Leute, es wird Zeit für den Baum.

translation.en: What? It's Christmas Eve already? Oh, no.
translation.de: Was? Es ist schon Heiligabend? O nein!

translation.en: If you don't remember by tonight, nobody will get any presents,
translation.de: Wenn es bis heute Abend nicht klappt, bekommt niemand Geschenke.

translation.en: and I won't get my Honkin Henry Extreme.
translation.de: Und ich nicht meinen Henry Hupe!

translation.en: No macaroni?
Oh, no.
Christmas will be ruined.
All right, kiddos. Let's go.
Hey, you should come with us. Maybe the Christmas music will, uh, ring some bells?
translation.de: Hey, komm doch mit. Vielleicht läuten dann ja die Glocken?

translation.en: [laughs] Bells. I love you.
Bells? Wait a second. That, that sounds familiar.
translation.de: Glocken? Moment mal. Das… kommt mir bekannt vor.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. Bells? You remember bells? Come on, let's go!
translation.de: O mein Gott. Du erinnerst dich? Los, kommt mit!

translation.en: Yay!
[Mama] Cory, slow down.
Come quick, come quick. This way.
We're definitely gonna find something here. [gasps]
How's this? You remember this bell?
Sorry.
[gasps] how 'bout this?
Does this remind you of anything?
Hmm, nope.
Sorry, not this bell either.
What? There's gotta be something that'll work. Hmm?
translation.de: Wie bitte? Irgendwas muss doch funktionieren.

translation.en: Welcome to the Bumperton Hills Christmas Tree Lighting Ceremony.
We'll be decorating the tree together,
and Eileen will top it all off with the Carol of the Bells.
[gasps] This is it. This'll definitely work. Come on!
translation.de: Das ist es. Das wird klappen. Komm!

translation.en: -Ooh. -Oh, this is gonna be great.
Awesome.
What do you think, Santa? Huh? Santa?
Whoa [giggles] Higher, Daddy, higher. [giggles]
[giggles] Higher, Daddy. Higher!
[gasps] I, I remember now.
Really?
I remember everything now.
You remember you're Santa?
No. [laughs] I remember my family. My name is Benjamin Bell.
translation.de: Nein. An meine Familie. Ich bin Benjamin Bell.

translation.en: What? Benjamin Bell?
Yes, Benjamin Bell, I'm from Spoiler Valley. I live there with my family.
translation.de: Ja, Benjamin Bell. Aus dem Spoiler-Tal. Dort lebt meine Familie.

translation.en: [Mama gasps] Your family? Did you get your memory back?
You're not Santa?
I, I guess not.
You're not Santa.
Hmm. Sorry, Cory.
That's, that's OK. Um, I'm glad you remembered who you are.
translation.de: Ist schon gut. Schön, dass du dich erinnerst.

translation.en: Thanks, Cory.
Wait, if you're not Santa,
translation.de: Warte. Wenn du nicht Santa bist,

translation.en: that means the real Santa's OK!
translation.de: geht es dem echten Santa gut!

translation.en: He's probably delivering gifts out there right now.
translation.de: Er liefert sicher gerade Geschenke aus.

translation.en: Yeah! Christmas is saved! Woohoo!
-[laughs] Yeah! Yeah! -[laughs] Well,
you know what to do with this.
[gasps] My letter. I gotta put this up for the real Santa.
translation.de: Mein Brief! Santa muss ihn bekommen.

translation.en: Let's go, hurry. [chuckles] Honkin Henry, here I come.
translation.de: Los, Beeilung! Henry Hupe, ich komme!

translation.en: Milk and cookies, check. Letter, check.
translation.de: Milch und Plätzchen, erledigt. Brief, erledigt.

translation.en: Everything else, check, check, check. [sighs] It's all done.
-Spoiler Valley? That's a three day drive. -Hmm?
translation.de: Spoiler-Tal? Das sind drei Tage Fahrt.

translation.en: Three days? I, I better get going then.
translation.de: Drei Tage? Dann sollte ich wohl los.

translation.en: Are you sure? It's dark and icy out there.
translation.de: Sind Sie sicher? Es ist dunkel und vereist.

translation.en: We wouldn't want you to get hurt again.
translation.de: Nicht, dass Sie noch einen Unfall haben.

translation.en: [sighs] I guess I won't see my family for Christmas this year.
translation.de: Weihnachten mit der Familie fällt dieses Jahr wohl aus.

translation.en: Well, you're more than welcome to stay here with us.
translation.de: Sie können gerne mit uns feiern.

translation.en: Thanks, that's, that's very kind of you.
translation.de: Danke, das ist… sehr nett von Ihnen.

translation.en: Try and get some rest for now, all right?
translation.de: -Ruhen Sie sich etwas aus, ok? -Gute Nacht, Ben.

translation.en: Goodnight, Ben. Come on, kids.
translation.de: -Ruhen Sie sich etwas aus, ok? -Gute Nacht, Ben. Ab ins Bett, Kinder. Damit Santa kommen kann.

translation.en: Gotta get to bed so Santa can deliver some presents.
translation.de: Ab ins Bett, Kinder. Damit Santa kommen kann.

translation.en: Macaroni! [giggles]
I'm sorry you won't be able to spend Christmas with your family this year.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass du nicht zu deiner Familie kannst.

translation.en: [sighs] Me too, Cory.
Thanks for helping me remember though. I'm glad Christmas isn't ruined.
translation.de: Aber danke für deine Hilfe. Weihnachten ist gerettet.

translation.en: Yeah.
[Papa] Cory!
Coming! Goodnight, Santa.
Oh, I mean, goodnight, Mr. Bell.
[Cory] Dear Santa, I've been thinking a lot about Christmas lately
translation.de: Lieber Santa, ich habe viel über Weihnachten nachgedacht.

translation.en: like you always do.
There's a lot of things that make Christmas, Christmas.
translation.de: Es gibt vieles, was Weihnachten ausmacht.

translation.en: The toys, the traditions, the lights, the toys,
translation.de: Das Spielzeug, die Traditionen, die Lichter, das Spielzeug…

translation.en: but today, I learned that Christmas isn't just about getting gifts...
translation.de: Aber heute habe ich gelernt, dass es nicht darum geht, was man kriegt.

translation.en: -[Cory] ...it's about giving them. -[laughs]
[Cory] Sometimes that gift can be a hug or a song or a bedtime story.
translation.de: Und das kann eine Umarmung, ein Lied oder eine Gutenachtgeschichte sein.

translation.en: Christmas isn't about what's under the tree, it's about who's around it.
translation.de: Es geht nicht darum, was unter dem Baum liegt. Sondern wer sich um ihn versammelt.

translation.en: -I know it's super late... -[laughs] ...but I wanted to switch my Christmas wish.
translation.de: Ich weiß, es ist spät, aber ich wollte meinen Wunsch ändern.

translation.en: For my present this year, I want my new friend Mr. Bell
translation.de: Ich wünsche mir, dass mein neuer Freund Mr. Bell

translation.en: to be able to spend Christmas with his family.
translation.de: Weihnachten mit seiner Familie verbringen kann.

translation.en: I hope it's not too much trouble to change my wish.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, das ist nicht allzu umständlich.

translation.en: Thanks for all the hard work and merry Christmas, Santa.
translation.de: Danke für deine harte Arbeit. Und frohe Weihnachten, Santa.

translation.en: Love, Cory Carson.
Christmas Christmas Christmas!
[gasps] It's Christmas!
[gasps] Cookies are gone.
Yay!
[gasps] Presents are under the tree! Presents!
Ben's not here! Santa brought Mr. Bell home to be with his family!
translation.de: Und Ben ist weg! Santa hat Mr. Bell nach Hause gebracht!

translation.en: Brought who home?
Ah! Wait, what are you doing here?
Uh, I stayed the night. Remember?
But my letter. My wish.
-[doorbell rings] -Oh, I wonder who that could be.
Your wish? What do you mean? Didn't you get your toy?
translation.de: Dein Wunsch? Warum? Hast du nichts bekommen?

translation.en: I changed my wish.
Changed? What did you change it to?
Uh, Benjamin?
[Benjamin gasps] Betty? Junior?
-Oh, we missed you Benjamin. -Daddy.
[laughs] How did you guys get here? Everyone, this is my family.
translation.de: Was macht ihr denn hier? Leute, das ist meine Familie!

translation.en: Oh, my goodness. We're just opening our Christmas gifts right now.
translation.de: Du meine Güte. Wir packen gerade Geschenke aus.

translation.en: Why don't you come and join us? This is Papa. This is Cory and Chrissy.
translation.de: Kommen Sie doch rein. Das ist Papa, Cory und Chrissy.

translation.en: [small laugh] Seems like we have lots to talk about today.
translation.de: Es gibt wohl viel zu erzählen.

translation.en: [laughs] Wow.
[laughs] I, I brought you some gifts.
Hey, buddy. Did you get your Honkin Henry Extreme?
translation.de: Hey, hast du deinen Henry Hupe bekommen?

translation.en: I got something better.
Well, what'd you get Chrissy? It's macaroni!
[Cory] Merry Christmas, everyone!
